name: Building a SoC in python with Migen
tagline: A simple guide to building a System-on-Chip in python with Migen
body:
### Building a System-on-Chip in python with Migen.

This is a simple guide documenting the process of creating a SoC in python using the [migen](https://github.com/milkymist/migen) toolbox. The SoC will be built for the [Virtex-6 FPGA ML605 Evaluation Kit](http://www.xilinx.com/products/boards-and-kits/EK-V6-ML605-G.htm)

The system will heavily follow the design of the [milkymist-ng](https://github.com/milkymist/milkymist-ng) SoC

#### Requirements
* python3
* migen
* mibuild
* Xilinx ISE command line tools
